            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>The Hillsborough River Association (HRA) and the Pisquid River Enhancement Project (PREP) have been collaboratively monitoring the primary watercourses of the Hillsborough River watershed for many years. HOBO data loggers are used for temperature monitoring and water samples are delivered to Holland College’s Department of Environmental Applied Science Technology for nitrate analysis. Angela Banks, the HRA’s project leader, and Emma Wattie, Director of Atlantic Water Network, developed key partnerships with The Gordon Foundation and WWF-Canada to coordinate the implementation of Atlantic DataStream under Environment & Climate Change Canada’s Atlantic Ecosystem Initiative funding. The HRA’s three-year AEI funding project “Watershed-based Monitoring & Database Development for Climate Change Adaptation” was a success, and both HRA and PREP intend to continue submitting water data to Atlantic DataStream indefinitely.</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>

fr: Bassin versant de la rivière Hillsborough

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-pn8e-1z58
notes: The Hillsborough River Association (HRA) and the Pisquid River Enhancement Project (PREP) have been collaboratively monitoring the primary watercourses of the Hillsborough River watershed for many years. HOBO data loggers are used for temperature monitoring and water samples are delivered to Holland College’s Department of Environmental Applied Science Technology for nitrate analysis. Angela Banks, the HRA’s project leader, and Emma Wattie, Director of Atlantic Water Network, developed key partnerships with The Gordon Foundation and WWF-Canada to coordinate the implementation of Atlantic DataStream under Environment & Climate Change Canada’s Atlantic Ecosystem Initiative funding. The HRA’s three-year AEI funding project “Watershed-based Monitoring & Database Development for Climate Change Adaptation” was a success, and both HRA and PREP intend to continue submitting water data to Atlantic DataStream indefinitely.

notes_translated.en: The Hillsborough River Association (HRA) and the Pisquid River Enhancement Project (PREP) have been collaboratively monitoring the primary watercourses of the Hillsborough River watershed for many years. HOBO data loggers are used for temperature monitoring and water samples are delivered to Holland College’s Department of Environmental Applied Science Technology for nitrate analysis. Angela Banks, the HRA’s project leader, and Emma Wattie, Director of Atlantic Water Network, developed key partnerships with The Gordon Foundation and WWF-Canada to coordinate the implementation of Atlantic DataStream under Environment & Climate Change Canada’s Atlantic Ecosystem Initiative funding. The HRA’s three-year AEI funding project “Watershed-based Monitoring & Database Development for Climate Change Adaptation” was a success, and both HRA and PREP intend to continue submitting water data to Atlantic DataStream indefinitely.
notes_translated.fr: La Hillsborough River Association (HRA) et le Pisquid River Enhancement Project (PREP) surveillent en collaboration les principaux cours d'eau du bassin versant de la rivière Hillsborough depuis de nombreuses années. Les enregistreurs de données HOBO sont utilisés pour surveiller la température et des échantillons d'eau sont livrés au département de technologie des sciences appliquées à l'environnement du Holland College pour analyse des nitrates. Angela Banks, chef de projet de la HRA, et Emma Wattie, directrice d'Atlantic Water Network, ont développé des partenariats clés avec la Gordon Foundation et le WWF-Canada pour coordonner la mise en œuvre d'Atlantic DataStream dans le cadre du financement de l'Initiative pour l'écosystème atlantique d'Environnement et Changement climatique Canada. Le projet triennal de financement de l'AEI de la HRA « Surveillance basée sur les bassins versants et développement de bases de données pour l'adaptation au changement climatique » a été un succès, et la HRA et la PREP ont l'intention de continuer à soumettre des données sur l'eau à Atlantic DataStream indéfiniment.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: HRA/PREP Water Quality Monitoring Data

title_translated.fr: Données de surveillance de la qualité de l'eau HRA/PREP
